title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Stockholm, Sweden
description:
We have decided to use Meetup for signing up for this event. Please sign up here: http://www.meetup.com/Stockholm-Software-Craftsmanship/events/217117312/

You have a seat reserved even if the Meetup event has filled up. Please send a message if you weren't able to reserve a seat at the Meetup.

Why did we change? The Meetup for Stockholm Software Craftsmen has many active members so we hope to be able to fill the event with them. 

See you at Global Day of Coderetreat!
Thomas & Jesper

@Tomas Sundberg: Will there be more information about the event posted here or elsewhere?
Hi! 
A description of what we are trying to achieve: http://globalday.coderetreat.org/ 
The short summary is: 
* It is a full day event. 
* Bring a laptop with a development environment installed. 
* There will be breakfast and lunch. 
Please ask if you want to know more. 
/Thomas
Sounds great! I'm familiar with the concept. I've been to two GDCR before. Hosted one of them. 
Who will facilitate the sessions?
